Key Match Events: Ecuador scored a goal via a Jamaica own goal in the 13th minute
Kendry Paez scored a penalty kick for Ecuador just before halftime
Alan Minda scored a goal for Ecuador in the 91st minute to kill off the contest
Jamaica scored their first-ever Copa América goal shortly after halftime
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador kept their hopes of qualifying for the Copa América quarterfinals alive with the win
Jamaica is now eliminated from the tournament following Venezuela's win on Wednesday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada
The referee for the match was Cristian Garay
Others: The game was covered by FS1
The line for the game was ECU -0.5 and the Over/Under was 2.5
The final group stage matches will be played on Sunday, with Jamaica playing Venezuela in Austin, Texas and Mexico facing Ecuador in Glendale, Arizona
